contexts.context: It is said that if a kagouti steps into a <mark>boiling</mark> pool, he will leap out immediately to avoid harm....
...wizard slowly raises the temperature, measure by measure, to <mark>boiling</mark>, the kagouti will calmly stand in place until he is...
..., the kagouti will calmly stand in place until he is <mark>boiled</mark>. Thus we see that we must be alert not only...
